products.title: Nike Men's Air Force 1 Shoes - White/White
products.longDescription: Hoops in the park, Sunday BBQs and sunshine. The radiance lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 ’07, the b-ball OG that puts a fresh spin on what you know best: crisp leather in an all-white colorway for a statement look on and off the court.
products.features:
• Full-grain leather in the upper adds a premium look and feel.
  • Originally designed for performance hoops, Nike Air cushioning adds lightweight, all-day comfort.
  • The low-cut silhouette adds a simple, streamlined look.
  • Padding at the collar feels soft and comfortable.
  • Foam midsole
  • Metal "AF1" dubrae
  • Perforations on the toe
  • Rubber sole
  • Full Grain Cow Leather

products.title: Under Armour Men's Charged Assert 8 Training Shoes - Black - Black/Black/Black
products.longDescription: TheUnder Armour Men’s Charged Assert 8 Training Shoe is a neutral shoe for runners who need a balance of flexibility  cushioning. It features a lightweight mesh upper with 3-color digital print that delivers complete breathability combined with an EVA sockliner provides soft, step-in comfort.
products.features:
• NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility cushioning
  • Lightweight mesh upper with 3-color digital print delivers complete breathability
  • Durable leather overlays for stability that locks in your midfoot
  • EVA sockliner provides soft, step-in comfort
  • Charged Cushioning® midsole uses compression molded foam for even greater responsiveness durability, providing
  • optimal cushioning energy return
  • Solid rubber outsole covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight

products.title: Nike Men's Path Winter Shoes  - Black
products.longDescription: When you’re up against harsh winter elements, the Nike Path Winter provides warmth and coverage in a rugged new seasonal style.
products.features:
• Enhanced Traction: A thick midsole and rubber outsole provide traction and grip.
  • Premium Style: An embossed Swoosh design and reflective elements on the upper add style and functionality.
  • Tongue and heel pull loops

products.longDescription: Variety keeps you motivated. For running, lifting or playing pickup games, these running shoes are all about versatile comfort. They have a lightweight build with pillow-like cushioning. No-sew overlays support the foot through quick bursts and lateral movements.

  • Mesh upper
  • Lightweight feel
  • Lightweight feel
  • Multipurpose running shoe

  • Rubber outsole

products.title: adidas Men's X_PLR Shoes - Black/Black
products.longDescription: Plan on getting lost in your own city. Bring only the basics for spontaneous exploration. Lightweight adidas X_PLR trainers won’t weigh you down. Take on the urban streets you’ve always been too busy to turn down. Check out your local street art and share your discoveries with friends. Kick off your shoes in a snap at the end of your day with easy elastic laces.
products.features:
• Lace closure
  • Textile upper
  • Lightweight shoes
  • Lightweight shoes
  • EVA midsole

  • Medium fit
  • Medium fit

products.title: ASICS Men's Gel Craze TR 4 Training Shoes - Grey/Black - Gray
products.priceLongMessage: *This item is not eligible for a return.
products.longDescription: The ASICS GEL-Craze™ TR 4 shoe combines protection and responsiveness for dynamic performance. Rearfoot GEL® Cushioning System provides protection against harsh impact - ideal for those who mix up their fitness routine on a variety of hard surfaces. Updated Solyte® Midsole material creates a lightweight and responsive bounce back experience, easing the transitions in lateral movements.
products.features:
• Rearfoot GEL® technology cushioning System
  • AHAR® Outsole
  • Solyte® Midsole Material
  • SpEVA® midsoles

products.title: Nike Men's Flex Control 3 4E Wide Width Training Shoes - Black/White/Anthracite - Blk/Wht/Anth
products.priceLongMessage: Select Women's & Men's Shoes 25% Off* Our in-store ticket price. Select styles. Excluding items already marked down. Selection and availability may vary by location. Order must be completed by December 3rd, 2020 1:59 AM ET to qualify.
products.longDescription: Emphasizing lightweight comfort and stability, the Nike Flex Control III Shoe (4E) is tailored to your training needs. Its lightweight, flexible upper features a midfoot saddle for adjustable stability, while its multi-surface outsole features deep flex grooves to let your foot move naturally.
products.features:
• Lightweight, abrasion-resistant material enhances durability.
  • Midfoot saddle provides an adjustable fit and stability.
  • Deep flex grooves let your foot move naturally.
  • Partial bootie and traditional tongue offer comfort and let you slip the shoe on and off easily.
  • Internal heel counter is designed for flexibility. It provides lateral stability on either side of the heel, but still allows for ankle mobility.
  • Zonal rubber outsole with a textured traction pattern enhances grip.

products.title: Nike Men's Downshifter 9 Running Shoes - Black/White/Grey - Black/White-anthracite-cool Grey
products.longDescription: The Nike Downshifter 9 blends closed mesh on the back that helps secure your foot during all-out sprints, with open mesh at the forefoot for optimal ventilation. Soft foam and flex grooves underfoot deliver a smooth ride.
products.features:
• Open mesh at the forefoot lets cool air in and heat out.
  • Closed mesh through the midfoot and heel provides structured support.
  • Soft, smooth foam midsole cushions your stride.
  • Tapered heel looks sleek and feels fast.
  • Rubber outsole offers durable traction.
  • Flex grooves let your foot move naturally.

products.title: Reebok Men's Flexile Training Shoes - Blue/Navy - Blu/Nvy
products.priceLongMessage: *This item is not eligible for a return.
products.longDescription: Your 'mix it up' approach to training deserves a like minded shoe. Reebok's featherweight TrainFlex Lite masters multi directional moves from airy top to grippy bottom. The thick underfoot cushioning is deep grooved in targeted zones for impressive flexibility that lets feet naturally do their thing.
products.features:
• Materials: mesh upper for breathability with a lightweight feel
  • Low-cut design for freedom of movement and quicker transitions
  • Designed for: multi direction drills, interval sets, everyday training
  • Sculpted IMEVA midsole for lighweight flexible cushioning
  • Flex grooved outsole for natural movement with strategic rubber hits for traction
  • Forefoot webbing and 3DFuseFrame technology offer multi direction support

products.title: ASICS Men's Gel Excite 7 Running Shoes - Black
products.longDescription: The ASICS Men’s Gel Excite 7 Running Shoe is a lightweight offering that introduces an improved fit in the forefoot to generate prolonged comfort no matter the distance. Designed with a technical mesh upper, the GEL-EXCITE™ 7 running shoe delivers excellent airflow throughout the interior to keep feet cool during a run. This style implements an ORTHOLITE™ sockliner in the footbed to maintain a lightweight feel that also helps keep feet dry and comfortable. The AMPLIFOAM™ application in the midsole works in conjunction with GEL™ technology to offer a cushioned underfoot that injects a stronger rebound into your stride. Versatile for runners looking for a shoe that excels in comfort and response, the GEL-EXCITE™ 7 model is a recommended selection for those who want to keep things simple.
products.features:
• Jacquard Mesh Upper for Breathability and Support
  • GEL™ technology for durability, comfort and impact
  • Amplifoam™ midsole
  • Ortholite™ sockliner

products.title: Nike Men's Flex Control TR 4 Training Shoes - Black/White Dk Smoke Grey Smoke Grey
products.longDescription: Tailored for bodyweight workouts, the Nike Men’s Flex Control TR 4 Training Shoes emphasizes mobility and stability. Its flexible sole lets your foot move naturally from 1 high-energy set to the next. It features a rubber outrigger at the sole for better stability during side-to-side drills.
products.features:
• Lightweight Support - Mesh upper provides lightweight breathability. A durable overlay wraps from the midfoot around the heel for added support.
  • Sturdy Stability - Segmented rubber outrigger on the forefoot of the sole gives you stability during side-to-side movements. Overlays above the outrigger add durability.
  • Durable lace loops for midfoot lockdown
  • Natural Movement - Nike Flex sole lets your foot move naturally. Textured rubber tread outlines the sole for durable traction and stability.

products.title: Nike Men's Shox NZ EU Shoes - Black - Black/Black
products.longDescription: The Men’s Nike Shox NZ EU Shoe offers responsive 4-column cushioning and finger construction through the midfoot that helps lock down the fit. The Nike Shox technology under the heel distributes weight to maximize impact absorption.
products.features:
• Finger construction through the midfoot provides support and flexibility.
  • Synthetic leather overlays for durability.
  • Lightweight Phylon cushions the forefoot.
  • Pebax® plate over the Shox columns helps provide lateral stability and support.
  • Solid rubber, tacky Waffle outsole tread for great traction.

products.title: Merrell Men's Moab 2 Vent Wide Hiking Shoes - Beluga
products.longDescription:
Experience out-of-the-box comfort in this ventilated hiker. With durable leathers, a supportive footbed, and Vibram® traction, all in a versatile package, you won’t doubt why the Merrell Moab 2 Vent Men’s Hiking Shoe is our best selling Shoe.

Exclusive to FGL Sports Ltd.
products.features:

  • Vibram® TC5+ outsole

products.title: ASICS Men's Gel Cumulus 21 Knit Running Shoes - Black/Pure Silver
products.longDescription: Run further than you thought possible with the GEL-CUMULUS™ 21 Knit running shoe from ASICS. The shoe is designed to help cushion and support your feet when running long distances. It features two midsole foams: one for lightweight softness and another that adds more spring to your step. This shoe also has rear and forefoot GEL™ technology for premium level shock absorption. Our GUIDANCE LINE™ technology helps you run more efficiently, while the internal heel counter holds your foot in position for added support. The flexible knit upper provides a comfortable fit and a more personalized feel. This feeling is exhibited because of the sockliner that molds to the shape of your foot for added comfort. The GEL-CUMULUS™ 21 Knit comes with a durable outsole that reduces wear at key impact areas while reflective details on the outside of the upper boost your visibility in low light conditions
products.features:
• Rear and forefoot GEL™ technology
  • Flytefoam™ Propel technology for responsive cushioning
  • Ahar™ outsole for durability
  • IGS™ (Impact Guidance System) technology for smooth transition
  • Knit Upper for flexibility and comfort

products.title: Columbia Men's Peakfreak X2 OutDry Hiking Shoes - Graphite - Graphite
products.longDescription: The Columbia Men’s Peakfreak X2 OutDry Hiking Shoes are lightweight and rugged, with a cushioned midsole and waterproof-breathable construction for wet weather performance. Featuring a non-marking rubber outsole that adapts to any terrain, so you can take on whatever comes your way.
products.features:
• Textile upper with welded synthetic overlays
  • OutDry™ breathable waterproof construction
  • Techlite™ lightweight midsole for long lasting comfort, superior cushioning, and high energy return
  • Omni-Grip™ non-marking traction rubber

products.title: Salomon Men's OUTbound GTX Hiking Shoes - Black/Gum - Blk/Gum
products.longDescription: Blending modern style and discrete performance details, the Salomon OUTbound GTX moves easily from daily life to any outdoor activity.
products.features:
• Protection: A durable toe cap protects your feet from rocks and other objects on the trail or in the city, and a ClimaShield waterproof membrane keeps rain and snow out.
  • Grip: Contagrip® outsole features a versatile lug pattern that is ready for any surface, wet or dry.
  • GORE-TEX keeps your feet dry -from the outside as well as from the inside.
  • Contagrip® MD outsole is focused on long-term wear. Using the most durable compound, it has a lug pattern that works equally well on both hard and smooth or soft and loose surfaces.

products.title: adidas Men's Queststar Flow Shoes - Black/Black
products.longDescription: Street style for those with running on the brain. These shoes pair pillow-soft Cloudfoam cushioning with a fresh, modern upper to own the pavement. An OrthoLite® sockliner adds to the comfort, and floating 3-Stripes boast adidas pride.
products.features:
• Lace closure
  • Textile upper with TPU details
  • Synthetic outsole
  • Textile lining
  • Heel pull
  • Cushioned Cloudfoam midsole
  • Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite® sockliner
  • Ultra-soft feel

products.title: Salomon Men's X Reveal Chukka CSWP Winter Boots - Blue
products.longDescription: Drawing on our trail expertise, we decided to build a really versatile winter boot that looks great in the city. When the cold, rain and snow start to set in, you’ll stay warm, comfy and dry with the X-REVEAL CHUKKA CSWP.
products.features:
• Warm comfort: We've prioritized your comfort with warm materials, a soft collar and cozy faux-fur lining
  • Winter essentials: With a winter Contagrip® outsole that stays grippy in cold temperatures and a waterproof membrane, you’ll be ready for any weather
  • Versatile style: Equipping you for the great outdoors, this versatile shoe also looks and feels at home in the city
  • ClimaSalomon™ Waterproof: A flexible, lightweight, full waterproof bootie to ensure complete weather protection
  • Insulated membrane: A membrane with an additional layer of material like fur or foam, providing good insulation for active consumers
  • Contagrip® W: For all winter applications, Contagrip® W uses a unique compound that maintains adhesion in freezing temperatures. Lug patterns depend on usage
